channel.title: SCAR still work?
channel.description: Does SCAR still work for rs? i heard that now jagex made it so the minimap changes colors, but I'm not sure if thats just a rumor. And if it is dead now, will it ever become alive again?

item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Scar will always work.

item.title: SCAR still work?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Cheesehunk, post:12, topic:227”][quote author=moparisthebest link=topic=6.msg255#msg255 date=1140716620]

Well, I’m not sure if the minimap changes colors all the time, but when I first log into a world, the minimap always starts too dark. Since this happens, I have to take my char all the way to a loading point so that it loads the minimap to the normal color set. If I don’t, this screws up any script walkers, since they have to find the right road color, and when they walk to a loading point the whole minimap gets lighter. Is this just my own problem, or…?

nope, this is what you have to do now
[/quote]

But I am pretty sure you only have to do it the first time you log in on the world??

Correct me if I am wrong.[/quote]

you are correct

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR still work?
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:11, topic:227”][quote author=SaveSomeFace link=topic=6.msg221#msg221 date=1140708556]
Well, I’m not sure if the minimap changes colors all the time, but when I first log into a world, the minimap always starts too dark. Since this happens, I have to take my char all the way to a loading point so that it loads the minimap to the normal color set. If I don’t, this screws up any script walkers, since they have to find the right road color, and when they walk to a loading point the whole minimap gets lighter. Is this just my own problem, or…?
[/quote]

nope, this is what you have to do now :D[/quote]

But I am pretty sure you only have to do it the first time you log in on the world??

Correct me if I am wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR still work?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

SaveSomeFace:

Well, I’m not sure if the minimap changes colors all the time, but when I first log into a world, the minimap always starts too dark. Since this happens, I have to take my char all the way to a loading point so that it loads the minimap to the normal color set. If I don’t, this screws up any script walkers, since they have to find the right road color, and when they walk to a loading point the whole minimap gets lighter. Is this just my own problem, or…?

nope, this is what you have to do now

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR still work?
item.dc:creator: @SaveSomeFace SaveSomeFace
item.description:
@SaveSomeFace wrote:

Well, I’m not sure if the minimap changes colors all the time, but when I first log into a world, the minimap always starts too dark. Since this happens, I have to take my char all the way to a loading point so that it loads the minimap to the normal color set. If I don’t, this screws up any script walkers, since they have to find the right road color, and when they walk to a loading point the whole minimap gets lighter. Is this just my own problem, or…?

Read full topic

item.title: SCAR still work?

it all comes in there, if you put it in your folder correctly you wont have any problems

Read full topic
